alert.note: Alert for Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 12:18PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Brevard County through 100 PM EDT... At 1217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Space Coast Airport, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Titusville, Port Saint John, Haulover Canal, Playalinda Beach and Space Coast Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Inland Northern Brevard; Mainland Northern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands
